= Bringing up roscore on dorado = 

Dorado is a computer sitting at the corner of 73B2 (currently where Kumagai san sits). To start up roscore, double click on the desktop icon "StartHrp4rLocal". This will start roscore locally on dorado.

After a while, the hrp dashboard should pop up. click on the gear icon to turn on the servos.
